fr.ign.cogit.geoxygene.appli.task.ui

Class TaskManagerPopup

  • Object
    • TaskManagerPopup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TaskManagerListener, ComponentListener, ItemListener, EventListener

    public class TaskManagerPopup
extends Object
implements TaskManagerListener, ItemListener, ComponentListener
    Author:
    JeT when tasks are running, this component fetches progress iteratively and updates TaskControllers (to show their status and progress)
